name: Lucky Burger (Esas, Kaja Arielle)
description:
Fulfill all your burger desires with the simple, repeated press and hold of a button! Make the burger of your dreams!

Lucky burger was made during Valmuen Game Jam, a one day game jam in Hamar. It was made by two people in only 6 hours. 

ART: 

Kaja Arielle Sommerstad Bergseth

Programming: 

Espen Haftorn Gonzalez

Floor and wall textures were found in Unreal Engine's starter content
